welcome_message_body: Welcome to Calabozo, Venezuela! Get ready to be charmed by our city's rich history, beautiful landscapes, and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and explore all that Calabozo has to offer.

restaurants.name: rest Tio Pepe
restaurants.description: rest Tio Pepe is a italian restaurant located in Calabozo.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Calabozo Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Calabozo Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.
